item.title: Using kind to Test Kubernetes
item.description: kind is a tool for running local Kubernetes clusters using Docker container “nodes”. kind was primarily designed for testing Kubernetes itself, but may be used for local development or CI. It requires Docker to be installed (it may work with podman but I've not tried) and the kind binary which can be installed in various ways 1brew install kind 2or 3sudo port selfupdate && sudo port install kind 4or 5choco install kind 6or 7go install sigs.
